TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsToken extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示能识别的单词或短语。

span.span: Represents a word or short phrase that can be recognized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的成员类，你可以指定词的三种形式：窗体中，窗体，并自定义的单词。Using the members of the class, you can specify three forms of a word: the form, the form, and a custom for the word. 如果多个字词存储在单个对象，每个将被视为不同的标记，内部，然后在结果中。If multiple words are stored in a single object, each is treated as a different token internally and in the result. 此类表示`token`由万维网联合会 (W3C) 定义的元素[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0。](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。This class represents the `token` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0.](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 璝惠 SRGS`token`元素以及它支持通过 System.Speech，有关详细信息请参阅[令牌元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a9e8d64-7bd4-4188-a6f4-dbf28ea71632)。For information about the SRGS `token` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [token Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a9e8d64-7bd4-4188-a6f4-dbf28ea71632).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string text) cil managed

param.name: text
param.span: 新建 类实例的文本。

span.span: The text of the new class instance.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例并指定要识别的文本。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the text to be recognized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建对象，其属性最初设置的值为`text`参数。Creates a object whose property is set initially to the value of the `text` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Display { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置需朗读的文本的显示形式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display form of the text to be spoken.

value.span: 标记应显示的表示形式。

span.span: A representation of the token as it should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管它们通常表示相同的值，但窗体可能不同于窗体中的单词或短语中。Although they typically represent the same value, the form may be different than the form for a word or phrase in a . 例如，显示窗体可能的首字母缩写，如"USA"时将使用的文本和向其适用，是"美国"。For example, the display form may be an acronym, such as "USA", while the text that will be spoken, and to which the applies, is "United States of America".

span.span: An attempt is made to set to .

exception.span: 试图将 指定为空字符串。

span.span: An attempt is made to assign an empty string to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Pronunciation { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置定义标记发音的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that defines the pronunciation for the token.

value.span: 返回包含在 中指定的语音字母表的电话的字符串。

span.span: Returns a string containing phones from the phonetic alphabet specified in .
An attempt is made to set to .

exception.span: 试图将 指定为空字符串。

span.span: An attempt is made to assign an empty string to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应朗读的单词的书写形式。

span.span: Gets or sets the written form of the word that should be spoken.

value.span: 在 类别实例中包含的文本。

span.span: The text contained within the class instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管它们通常表示相同的值，但窗体可能不同于窗体中的单词或短语中。Although they typically represent the same value, the form may be different than the form for a word or phrase in a . 例如，窗体可能是首字母缩写词，如"USA"时将使用的文本和向其适用，是"美国"。For example, the form may be an acronym, such as "USA", while the text that will be spoken, and to which the applies, is "United States of America". 默认值为属性为空字符串-""。The default value for the property is an empty string—"".

span.span: An attempt is made to set to .

exception.span: 试图将 指定为空字符串。

span.span: An attempt is made to assign an empty string to .

exception.span: 尝试把包含引号 (") 的字符串分配到 。

span.span: An attempt is made to assign a string that contains a quotation mark (") to .
